channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Powerball's Christmas Eve drawing dangles a $1.82 billion Christmas miracle
item.description: Powerball's $1.817 billion Christmas Eve jackpot was won by a single ticket sold in Arkansas, lottery officials said Thursday. Why it matters: The win...

item.title: Trump tells kid in Christmas call he wants to ensure "bad Santa" isn't "infiltrating" U.S.
item.description: President Trump discussed with kids Wednesday Santa Claus' Christmas Eve travels being followed through the North American Aerospace Defense Command's...

item.title: Photos: Storm slamming Southern California with flooding rains triggers evacuations
item.description: A "life-threatening" winter storm system that began pummeling Southern California with flooding rains Wednesday and triggered evacuation orders in the...

item.title: DOJ: It may take "a few more weeks" to finish releasing Epstein files

item.title: Commission tees up first hearing on Trump’s ballroom construction
item.description: The National Capital Planning Commission is preparing to host a presentation on the White House ballroom building next month.

item.title: Federal government’s charity drive doing far worse under Trump
item.description: Donations are down by more than 40 percent after a year when federal workers faced major agency downsizing and a lengthy government shutdown.

item.title: For one migrant family, no Christmas lights in New Orleans
item.description: After the Border Patrol arrived in Louisiana, a couple and their five children went into hiding. That meant less food, few outings and no lights on th...

item.title: Two vulnerable senators stand to benefit from intense focus on constituents
item.description: Sens. Susan Collins (R-Maine) and Jon Ossoff (D-Georgia) are two of the chamber’s staunchest believers in the value of constituency services.

item.title: Trump-backed candidate Tito Asfura declared Honduras presidential election winner
item.description: Trump -backed Honduras conservative National Party presidential candidate Nasry "Tito" Asfura was declared winner of the country's election on Wednesd...

item.title: With more than a million pages to go, Justice struggles with Epstein files
item.description: The massive size of the Epstein files — perhaps more than a million pages — has created problems for the Justice Department.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
